title: iRobot emerges from Chapter 11 as restructured Picea U.S. subsidiary
description:
iRobot has restructured after its bankruptcy proceedings and purchase by Chinese manufacturer Picea, adding a data security unit in the U.S.

The post iRobot emerges from Chapter 11 as restructured Picea U.S. subsidiary appeared first on The Robot Report.
